events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah T. from the Refunds Department for further assistance.
Hello, I'm Sarah and I'll be helping you today with your refund request for the incorrect item.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can proceed?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached the photo showing that I got the wrong product.
Thank you for the details. I will process a full refund immediately, and you can keep the incorrect item as an apology.
Thanks for the quick resolution and generous offer, I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund.
The refund has been processed and should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund and are satisfied with the resolution provided.
Since no further concerns were raised, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
